com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics

Class ModernRoboticsUsbDevice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qualcomm.hardware.ArmableUsbDevice
      • com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics.ModernRoboticsUsbDevice
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadWriteRunnable.Callback
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModernRoboticsUsbController, ModernRoboticsUsbI2cController

    public abstract class ModernRoboticsUsbDevice
extends ArmableUsbDevice
implements ReadWriteRunnable.Callback
    Base class for Modern Robotics USB Devices
